thread.title: The roof top bar is a must see.
thread.title_full: The roof top bar is a must see. - Review of Hilton New York Fashion District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MrInternational84
title: The roof top bar is a must see.
text: My second time back at this hotel and it was as good as the first. Roof top bar is a cool place, clean rooms, great staff, great location. Shasika was awesome just like our first time here. she helped me the last time around and was helpful on this second trip as well. she is truly an asset to your hotel. see ya next time.
